flavor: "Release that which was never caged." —Spellbomb inscription
name: Aether Spellbomb
text:
{U}, Sacrifice Aether Spellbomb: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
{1}, Sacrifice Aether Spellbomb: Draw a card.

flavor: Once a welcoming hub for explorers, Affa became a place of guarded tongues and quick defenses.
name: Affa Guard Hound
text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
When Affa Guard Hound enters the battlefield, target creature gets +0/+3 until end of turn.

flavor: The problem isn't the indrik's enthusiasm, it's Ravnica's lack of guardrails.
name: Affectionate Indrik
text: When Affectionate Indrik enters the battlefield, you may have it fight target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

flavor: The power of the wild, concentrated in a single charge.
name: Aggressive Urge
text:
Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Draw a card.

flavor:
"Your death will take a mere moment, but it will feel like an eternity."
—Vilis, Broker of Blood
name: Agonizing Syphon
text: Agonizing Syphon deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.

name: Allosaurus Shepherd
text:
Allosaurus Shepherd can't be countered.
Green spells you control can't be countered.
{4}{G}{G}: Until end of turn, each Elf creature you control has base power and toughness 5/5 and becomes a Dinosaur in addition to its other creature types.

flavor: With or without witnesses, the suns continued their prismatic dance.
name: Alloy Myr
text: {T}: Add one mana of any color.

flavor: Treefolk and elves share a common interest in the forests, but really the elves just feel at home with the view from above.
name: Ambassador Oak
text: When Ambassador Oak enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.

flavor: The mage awakened the statue in hopes of learning the lost lore of her clan, but the statue was interested only in war.
name: Ancestral Statue
text: When Ancestral Statue enters the battlefield, return a nonland permanent you control to its owner's hand.

flavor: Knowledge itself is neither good nor evil. Just as the wrong book in the wrong hands could doom all existence, the same book in the right hands could save it.
name: Arcane Encyclopedia
text: {3}, {T}: Draw a card.

flavor: "Just as a broken relic can be mended, a shattered history can be made whole."
name: Archaeomender
text: When Archaeomender enters the battlefield, return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

flavor: Its fiery paws make it easy to track, which is very useful when you want to go in exactly the opposite direction.
name: Ashmouth Hound
text: Whenever Ashmouth Hound blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, Ashmouth Hound deals 1 damage to that creature.

flavor: When Selesnya missionaries moved into the Shanav Quarter, they faced scorn, ridicule, and ultimately martyrdom.
name: Assassin's Strike
text: Destroy target creature. Its controller discards a card.

name: Assault Formation
text:
Each creature you control assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power.
{G}: Target creature with defender can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.
{2}{G}: Creatures you control get +0/+1 until end of turn.

flavor:
"Finally, a weapon the Boros can't confiscate!"
—Juri, proprietor of the Juri Revue
name: Auger Spree
text: Target creature gets +4/-4 until end of turn.

flavor: The druids of Mazar treat each seedcone with respect for the warrior it will become.
name: Awakener Druid
text: When Awakener Druid enters the battlefield, target Forest becomes a 4/5 green Treefolk creature for as long as Awakener Druid remains on the battlefield. It's still a land.

flavor: "My secret ingredient? Well, I can't tell you that. But here's a hint. It's not love."
name: Bake into a Pie
text: Destroy target creature. Create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

flavor: The trick to talking sense into Keldons is getting them to hold still.
name: Befuddle
text:
Target creature gets -4/-0 until end of turn.
Draw a card.

flavor: Its last life is spent tormenting your dreams.
name: Black Cat
text: When Black Cat dies, target opponent discards a card at random.

name: Blessed Sanctuary
text:
Prevent all noncombat damage that would be dealt to you and creatures you control.
Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, create a 2/2 white Unicorn creature token.

flavor: Amonkhet's dual suns don't allow for the darkness of night, so bats are most active under the gloom of the frequent sandstorms.
name: Blighted Bat
text:
Flying
{1}: Blighted Bat gains haste until end of turn.

flavor: "Great art can never be created without great suffering."
name: Blood Artist
text: Whenever Blood Artist or another creature dies, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

flavor: Predicting the future is a messy business.
name: Blood Divination
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Draw three cards.

flavor: It would be ill-mannered to decline his invitation. It would be ill-advised to accept it.
name: Blood Host
text: {1}{B}, Sacrifice another creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Blood Host and you gain 2 life.

flavor:
"Let the vampires join us. In this war, we no longer have the luxury of choosing our comrades."
—General Tazri, allied commander
name: Bloodbond Vampire
text: Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodbond Vampire.

flavor: It returns eager to share the feast of blood and gore with its ghoulish master.
name: Bloodhunter Bat
text:
Flying
When Bloodhunter Bat enters the battlefield, target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

flavor:
"There are only fifty words in the cyclops language, and ten of them mean 'kill.'"
—Ertai
name: Bloodrock Cyclops
text: Bloodrock Cyclops attacks each combat if able.

flavor: "The hardest thing is finding the right ingredients."
name: Bogbrew Witch
text: {2}, {T}: Search your library for a card named Festering Newt or Bubbling Cauldron, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

flavor: They are the first to greet dissenters on their journey into exile.
name: Bone Picker
text:
This spell costs {3} less to cast if a creature died this turn.
Flying, deathtouch

flavor: "Which do you deserve, the heft of a femur or the graceful sharpness of a forearm? Decisions, decisions . . ." —Gisa the Mad
name: Bone Splinters
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Destroy target creature.

flavor: A ray of hope in the darkest night.
name: Brightmare
text: When Brightmare enters the battlefield, tap up to one target creature. You gain life equal to that creature's power.

flavor: Hunters lure the stripling boar into the open, hoping to trap greater prey.
name: Brindle Shoat
text: When Brindle Shoat dies, create a 3/3 green Boar creature token.

flavor: Magistrate Ludy agreed to designate land for the brushstriders only after several broken windows and dozens of missing blini-cakes.
name: Brushstrider
text: Vigilance

name: Bubbling Cauldron
text:
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain 4 life.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature named Festering Newt: Each opponent loses 4 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

flavor:
"Even rats hoard their treasures. Are your precious things so different?"
—Izoni
name: Burglar Rat
text: When Burglar Rat enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.

flavor: History has buried its treasures deep.
name: Buried Ruin
text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Buried Ruin: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

flavor: The mouth must be pried open before rigor mortis sets in. Otherwise the returning soul can find no ingress.
name: Cadaver Imp
text:
Flying
When Cadaver Imp enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

flavor: So-called "old wood" is rare in deforested Ravnica. Statues carved from it are said to house the last of the ancient nature spirits.
name: Carven Caryatid
text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
When Carven Caryatid enters the battlefield, draw a card.

flavor: "Unwavering and loyal, they represent stability in uncertain times." —Rem Karolus, Slayer of Angels
name: Cathar's Companion
text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Cathar's Companion gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

flavor: Every day the cat returns to kill the same mouse, which sinks again into the cauldron's brew.
name: Cauldron Familiar
text:
When Cauldron Familiar enters the battlefield, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
Sacrifice a Food: Return Cauldron Familiar from your graveyard to the battlefield.

flavor: "There's a smoothness to my magic here that I don't find on any other plane."
name: Cemetery Recruitment
text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. If it's a Zombie card, draw a card.

name: Chamber Sentry
text:
Chamber Sentry enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.
{X}, {T}, Remove X +1/+1 counters from Chamber Sentry: It deals X damage to any target.
{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Return Chamber Sentry from your graveyard to your hand.

flavor: No guilds—that is her rule. The House vampires unnerve her. The Combine would dissect her, the Legion burn her, the Conclave "cure" her. The shadows are all the family she needs.
name: Child of Night
text: Lifelink

flavor:
"As expected, this sphere's design reflects the colors of the four moons . . . plus another?"
—Pontifex, elder researcher
name: Chromatic Sphere
text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Chromatic Sphere: Add one mana of any color. Draw a card.

flavor:
"The old gods awoke and sent fingers of fire to see what was left of the old ways under the endless city."
—Daiva, Gruul storyteller
name: Cinder Elemental
text: {X}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Cinder Elemental: It deals X damage to any target.

name: Cloudreader Sphinx
text:
Flying
When Cloudreader Sphinx enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

name: Commune with Dinosaurs
text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a Dinosaur or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

name: Craterhoof Behemoth
text:
Haste
When Craterhoof Behemoth enters the battlefield, creatures you control gain trample and get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures you control.

text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Flying
When Crookclaw Transmuter enters the battlefield, switch target creature's power and toughness until end of turn.

flavor:
"Well, this can't be a good sign."
—Old Rutstein
name: Crow of Dark Tidings
text:
Flying
When Crow of Dark Tidings enters the battlefield or dies, put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.

flavor:
"Do not mistake your lofty vantage point for safety."
—Shaper Tuvasa
name: Crushing Canopy
text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target creature with flying.
• Destroy target enchantment.

flavor: "Surely you know the joy of the hunt, my furry friend. My kind of hunt just takes a different form than yours."
name: Curiosity
text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.

flavor: Silent as winter snow, it seeks wild places unspoiled by the walking dead.
name: Dawntreader Elk
text: {G}, Sacrifice Dawntreader Elk: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

flavor: "It's cold in the grave, and the dead crave your warmth. Who are you to deny them?" —Strava, Dimir mage
name: Death's Approach
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -X/-X, where X is the number of creature cards in its controller's graveyard.

flavor:
"Welcome to the Dimir Public Offices. Not responsible for death or loss of property. Basement off-limits."
—Sign outside Dinrova Building
name: Dinrova Horror
text: When Dinrova Horror enters the battlefield, return target permanent to its owner's hand, then that player discards a card.

flavor: When times are tough, the poor eat the rats. When times are tougher, the rats eat the poor.
name: Drainpipe Vermin
text: When Drainpipe Vermin dies, you may pay {B}. If you do, target player discards a card.

flavor: "I will not live as a slave. If you would be free, then fight alongside me."
name: Drana, Liberator of Malakir
text:
Flying, first strike
Whenever Drana, Liberator of Malakir deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on each attacking creature you control.

flavor: Only the Eldrazi mind thinks in the warped paths required to open the hedrons and tap the power within.
name: Dreamstone Hedron
text:
{T}: Add {C}{C}{C}.
{3}, {T}, Sacrifice Dreamstone Hedron: Draw three cards.

flavor: "I do not lead. They do not follow. We walk together."
name: Drover of the Mighty
text:
Drover of the Mighty gets +2/+2 as long as you control a Dinosaur.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

flavor: The dragon who eats the last head in the basket is entitled to the servant's.
name: Dutiful Attendant
text: When Dutiful Attendant dies, return another target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

flavor: Call one, call them all.
name: Dwynen's Elite
text: When Dwynen's Elite enters the battlefield, if you control another Elf, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.

flavor:
"My heart and Zendikar's beat as one. Together we will endure."
—Nissa Revane
name: Elemental Uprising
text: Target land you control becomes a 4/4 Elemental creature with haste until end of turn. It's still a land. It must be blocked this turn if able.

flavor: He knows the name of every elf born in the last four centuries. More importantly, they all know his.
name: Elvish Archdruid
text:
Other Elf creatures you control get +1/+1.
{T}: Add {G} for each Elf you control.

name: Emiel the Blessed
text:
{3}: Exile another target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.
Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {G/W}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on it. If it's a Unicorn, put two +1/+1 counters on it instead. ({G/W} can be paid with either {G} or {W}.)

flavor: For Mittens, it was just another day at the beach.
name: Enlarge
text: Target creature gets +7/+7 and gains trample until end of turn. It must be blocked this turn if able. (A creature with trample can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

name: Entomber Exarch
text:
When Entomber Exarch enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature card from it. That player discards that card.

flavor: An Izzet experiment begins with a "what if," gets approved with a "why not," and concludes with a "eureka!"
name: Erratic Visionary
text: {1}{U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

flavor:
"They are called Eternals. They will never stop."
—Jace Beleren
name: Eternal Taskmaster
text:
Eternal Taskmaster enters the battlefield tapped.
Whenever Eternal Taskmaster attacks, you may pay {2}{B}. If you do, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has lifelink and "Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature." (Damage dealt by a creature with lifelink also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

flavor: "Terrifying, but thankfully temporary." —Teferi
name: Exclude
text:
Counter target creature spell.
Draw a card.

flavor: Successful battles start with knowing who's worth fighting.

text: When Exclusion Mage enters the battlefield, return target creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.

flavor: "Death—an outmoded concept. We sleep, and we change." —Sitrik, birth priest

text: Each player puts a creature card from their graveyard onto the battlefield.

flavor: An explorer's reward is a view of tomorrow's possibilities.
name: Explore
text:
You may play an additional land this turn.
Draw a card.

flavor: Even as humans regained the upper hand, some still willingly traded their lives for a chance at immortality.
name: Exquisite Blood
text: Whenever an opponent loses life, you gain that much life.

flavor: "My visions don't show me home. They show me where home is yet to be found."
name: Fa'adiyah Seer
text: {T}: Draw a card and reveal it. If it isn't a land card, discard it.

flavor: "I often think on how excited they must feel to be chosen as my prey."
name: Falkenrath Noble
text:
Flying
Whenever Falkenrath Noble or another creature dies, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

flavor:
"The Brazen Coalition is a firecannon pointed at our enemies. Goblins like him are the spark to its powder."
—Admiral Beckett Brass

text:
Haste

text:
Flying

Whenever an opponent discards a card, that player loses 2 life.

Feral Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.

{1}{G}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Fertilid: Target player searches their library for a basic land card, puts it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffles their library.

flavor: Its back bubbles like a witch's cauldron, and it smells just as vile.
name: Festering Newt
text: When Festering Newt dies, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn. That creature gets -4/-4 instead if you control a creature named Bogbrew Witch.

flavor: "You're in luck. I brought enough to share." —Chandra Nalaar
name: Flames of the Firebrand
text: Flames of the Firebrand deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three targets.

flavor: Funerary masks help the newly dead resist the erosion of memory and identity in the Underworld.
name: Funeral Rites
text: You draw two cards, lose 2 life, and put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.

flavor: As the shards merged into the Maelstrom, their mana energies fused into new monstrosities.

flavor:
"Do not mistake a quiet rampart for one that is unguarded. Some things stir only when they need to."
—Bonovar, siege commander
name: Gargoyle Sentinel
text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{3}: Until end of turn, Gargoyle Sentinel loses defender and gains flying.

This spell costs {X} less to cast, where X is the total power of creatures you control.
Trample

text: {2}{G}: Target creature you control can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less this turn.

text: {B}, {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Create X 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens, where X is the sacrificed creature's power.

flavor: "Once in the box, we're all the same."

text: {3}{B}, Exile Ghoulcaller's Accomplice from your graveyard: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

name: Ghoulraiser

Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

name: Grim Lavamancer

flavor:
"You've begun to understand the hedrons' true purpose," said Ugin. "The Eldrazi can be imprisoned."
"And how did that work out last time?" asked Jace.
name: Hedron Archive
text:
{T}: Add {C}{C}.

name: Hunter's Insight
text: Choose target creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker this turn, draw that many cards.

flavor: Zombies mourn for the living and celebrate those who will soon be given the gift of death.

—Skerk Hobnett, wilderness guide

text:
Target creature must be blocked this turn if able.

"Don't let it fool you. Many of us got our first scars from Syr Nobody."
—Syr Layne, knight of Embereth

name: Mirrodin's Core
text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Put a charge counter on Mirrodin's Core.
{T}, Remove a charge counter from Mirrodin's Core: Add one mana of any color.

flavor:
"Only the foolhardy would venture into the Akoum Mountains without a lullmage to tame the raging rocks and living fires."
—Sachir, Akoum Expeditionary House
name: Molten Ravager
text: {R}: Molten Ravager gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

flavor: It wasn't long until the elves had developed a use for every part of the Eldrazi.
name: Momentous Fall
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
You draw cards equal to the sacrificed creature's power, then you gain life equal to its toughness.

flavor:
"It's so cute when it's sleeping, isn't it? Actually, it's still as abhorrent as ever, but at least it's not trying to kill us."
—Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage
name: Narcolepsy
text:
Enchant creature
At the beginning of each upkeep, if enchanted creature is untapped, tap it.

flavor: Many elves incorporate the beauty of nature into their inventions. Very few capture its savagery.
name: Nature's Way
text: Target creature you control gains vigilance and trample until end of turn. It deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.

name: New Horizons
text:
Enchant land
When New Horizons enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
Enchanted land has "{T}: Add two mana of any one color."

name: Neyith of the Dire Hunt
text:
Whenever one or more creatures you control fight or become blocked, draw a card.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may pay {2}{R/G}. If you do, double target creature's power until end of turn. That creature must be blocked this combat if able. ({R/G} can be paid with either {R} or {G}.)

flavor: A living pulse is an irresistable temptation.
name: Nocturnal Feeder
text:
Flying
When Nocturnal Feeder dies, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

flavor: Born of volcanic forces, it thrives on the absolute panic it inspires.
name: Nyxathid
text:
As Nyxathid enters the battlefield, choose an opponent.
Nyxathid gets -1/-1 for each card in the chosen player's hand.

flavor: It manifests at wizard academies to siphon inspiration from young prodigies.
name: Oneirophage
text:
Flying
Whenever you draw a card, put a +1/+1 counter on Oneirophage.

name: Oracle of Mul Daya
text:
You may play an additional land on each of your turns.
Play with the top card of your library revealed.
You may play lands from the top of your library.

flavor: The frillbacks of Orazca soak up the sun on their tall spinal fins. They look slow and sleepy—until they catch the scent of prey.
name: Orazca Frillback
Ormos, Archive Keeper
text:
Flying
If you would draw a card while your library has no cards in it, instead put five +1/+1 counters on Ormos, Archive Keeper.
{1}{U}{U}, Discard three cards with different names: Draw five cards.

flavor: "Our enemy is nothing less than the end of all life. We shall not want for allies." —The War Diaries
name: Overgrown Battlement
text:
Defender
{T}: Add {G} for each creature with defender you control.

flavor: "Can't a fella get a moment's peace around here?"
name: Pacifism
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

flavor: "Soulless demon, you are bound to me. Now we will both dwell in oblivion."
name: Peel from Reality
text: Return target creature you control and target creature you don't control to their owners' hands.

flavor: This cat has two lives and it's hunting for more.
name: Penumbra Bobcat
text: When Penumbra Bobcat dies, create a 2/1 black Cat creature token.

flavor: "I believe many worlds will bow to Phyrexia. Mirrodin is merely the first." —Sheoldred, Whispering One
name: Phyrexian Rager
text: When Phyrexian Rager enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

flavor:
"Yawgmoth is dead, and his citadels lie empty. But there will always be some who seek power at any price."
—Karn
name: Phyrexian Tower
text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Sacrifice a creature: Add {B}{B}.

flavor: May the worthy spend an eternity in Blessed Sleep. May the wicked find the peace of oblivion.
name: Pillar of Flame
text: Pillar of Flame deals 2 damage to any target. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

name: Prescient Chimera
text:
Flying
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

flavor: "Here lies Gond, hero of Safehold Taldwen. May he ever guide our quest."
name: Presence of Gond
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "{T}: Create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token."

flavor: For each creature that arrives in its audience, the sage imparts another piece of ancient wisdom for all to hear.
name: Primordial Sage
text: Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may draw a card.

flavor: "The explorer who found it got a bad deal when he sold it. He merely got rich."
name: Prophetic Prism
text:
When Prophetic Prism enters the battlefield, draw a card.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

flavor:
"Whoever thought of making mobile volcanoes was a genius."
—Chandra Nalaar
name: Pyroclastic Elemental
text: {1}{R}{R}: Pyroclastic Elemental deals 1 damage to target player.

flavor: Its breath is a gale. Its roar is a volcano. Its anger tears soul from flesh.
name: Raging Regisaur
text: Whenever Raging Regisaur attacks, it deals 1 damage to any target.

flavor: Not even the tallest tree stands a chance against the underside of a dinosaur's foot.
name: Rampaging Brontodon
text:
Trample
Whenever Rampaging Brontodon attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each land you control.

flavor: "All we know about the Krosan Forest we have learned from those few who made it out alive." —Elvish refugee
name: Ravenous Baloth
text: Sacrifice a Beast: You gain 4 life.

flavor: Opening Orazca unleashed more horrors than just the Immortal Sun.
name: Ravenous Chupacabra
text: When Ravenous Chupacabra enters the battlefield, destroy target creature an opponent controls.

flavor:
"You'd better be worth it."
—Liliana Vess
name: Reanimate
text: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost.

flavor: They charge into battle and out for their morning walk with the same exuberance.
name: Release the Dogs
text: Create four 1/1 white Dog creature tokens.

flavor: Friends teach what you want to know. Enemies teach what you *need* to know.
name: Rhystic Study
text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may draw a card unless that player pays {1}.

name: Riptide Laboratory
text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}{U}, {T}: Return target Wizard you control to its owner's hand.

flavor: "For every living person there are generations of dead. Which realm would you rather rule?" —Liliana Vess
name: Rise of the Dark Realms
text: Put all creature cards from all graveyards onto the battlefield under your control.

flavor:
"It wandered slowly across the landscape, calling out in its lonely voice, but no other castles answered its cries."
—*Beyond the Great Henge*
name: Roving Keep
text:
Defender
{7}: Roving Keep gets +2/+0 and gains trample until end of turn. It can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.

flavor: In the dim light beneath the vast trees of Deepglade, baloths prowl in search of prey. Their guttural calls are more felt than heard, but their attack scream carries for miles.
name: Rumbling Baloth

flavor: Scholars had puzzled for centuries over the ruins at Tal Terig. Its secrets had always lived within one rune-carved head.
name: Runed Servitor
text: When Runed Servitor dies, each player draws a card.

name: Rupture Spire
text:
Rupture Spire enters the battlefield tapped.
When Rupture Spire enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you pay {1}.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

flavor: The streets of Ravnica are full of former guild members now using their institutional skills for personal gain.
name: Sage's Row Savant
text: When Sage's Row Savant enters the battlefield, scry 2.

name: Sangromancer
text:
Flying
Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you may gain 3 life.
Whenever an opponent discards a card, you may gain 3 life.

name: Savage Stomp
text:
This spell costs {2} less to cast if it targets a Dinosaur you control.
Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Then that creature fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

flavor: Her poppets bring joy to the truly depraved.
name: Scarecrone
text:
{1}, Sacrifice a Scarecrow: Draw a card.
{4}, {T}: Return target artifact creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

name: Scholar of the Lost Trove
text:
Flying
When Scholar of the Lost Trove enters the battlefield, you may cast target instant, sorcery, or artifact card from your graveyard without paying its mana cost. If an instant or sorcery spell cast this way would be put into your graveyard this turn, exile it instead.

flavor: "May all the cairns of Jund be toppled." —Meren of Clan Nel Toth
name: Scourge of Nel Toth
text:
Flying
You may cast Scourge of Nel Toth from your graveyard by paying {B}{B} and sacrificing two creatures rather than paying its mana cost.

flavor: With five lenses on its "head," it sees the world in a range of colors beyond ordinary perception.
name: Scuttlemutt
text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{T}: Target creature becomes the color or colors of your choice until end of turn.

flavor: "The secret entrance should be near."
name: Sea Gate Oracle
text: When Sea Gate Oracle enters the battlefield, look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.

flavor:
"Trying to stop it would be foolish. If you feel it coming—run!"
—Sergeant Ryda
name: Seismic Elemental
text: When Seismic Elemental enters the battlefield, creatures without flying can't block this turn.

name: Selvala, Heart of the Wilds
text:
Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, its controller may draw a card if its power is greater than each other creature's power.
{G}, {T}: Add X mana in any combination of colors, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.

flavor: Empires rise and fall, but evil is eternal.
name: Sengir Vampire
text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Sengir Vampire this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Sengir Vampire.

flavor: "You bound me with a contract only your death could end—and you thought me the fool?" —Liliana Vess
name: Settle the Score
text: Exile target creature. Put two loyalty counters on a planeswalker you control.

flavor: "The Kolaghan send them at us. We kill and raise them. They fight the next wave the Kolaghan send. It's a neat little cycle." —Asmala, Silumgar sorcerer
name: Shambling Goblin
text: When Shambling Goblin dies, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

flavor: Whether mechanical or biological, life finds a way to propagate itself.
name: Sharding Sphinx
text:
Flying
Whenever an artifact creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you may create a 1/1 blue Thopter artifact creature token with flying.

name: Sheoldred, Whispering One
text:
Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, that player sacrifices a creature.

flavor:
"Accursed scarecrow! Sending folk in every direction is the same as sending them nowhere at all."
—Corliss the Wanderer
name: Signpost Scarecrow
text:
Vigilance
{2}: Add one mana of any color.

flavor: "Stay close! It's just a little farther."
name: Silhana Wayfinder
text: When Silhana Wayfinder enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or land card from among them and put it on top of your library. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

flavor: Like a cross between a spider and a spyglass, but friendlier.
name: Skittering Surveyor
text: When Skittering Surveyor enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

flavor: Despite the reemergence of werewolves and the proliferation of Eldrazi, elk numbers in the Somberwald have remained steady.
name: Somberwald Stag
text: When Somberwald Stag enters the battlefield, you may have it fight target creature you don't control.

flavor: It's there when a seed sprouts, when gourds ripen on the vines, and when the reapers cut the grains under the Harvest Moon.
name: Soul of the Harvest
text:
Trample
Whenever another nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card.

flavor:
"Within each of you is the strength of a landslide."
—Kumano, to his pupils
name: Spitting Earth
text: Spitting Earth deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.

flavor:
"If you threaten its territory, it produces spores. Actually, no matter what you do, it produces spores."
—Hadi Kasten, Calla Dale naturalist
name: Sporemound
text: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

flavor: In his hands, the wind can become a weapon or a means of escape.
name: Storm Sculptor
text:
Storm Sculptor can't be blocked.
When Storm Sculptor enters the battlefield, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.

flavor: Good dogs stay by your side until the end. Great dogs leave to bring back aid.
name: Supply Runners
text: When Supply Runners enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.

flavor: All the books were dusty with disuse, save the one titled *Camouflage and Its Practical Applications*.
name: Suspicious Bookcase
text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{3}, {T}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

flavor: In the Gudul delta, bloodfly bites are indistinguishable from spear wounds.
name: Swarm of Bloodflies
text:
Flying
Swarm of Bloodflies enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
Whenever another creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Swarm of Bloodflies.

flavor: The mournful lowing of brushstriders warns of changing weather and ill winds.
name: Sylvan Brushstrider
text: When Sylvan Brushstrider enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.

flavor: "Not all paths are found on the forest floor."
name: Sylvan Ranger
text: When Sylvan Ranger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

flavor: After Talrand conquered the depths of Shandalar, his ambitions drove him skyward, joined by servants whose drive and curiosity equaled his own.
name: Talrand's Invocation
text: Create two 2/2 blue Drake creature tokens with flying.

flavor: "The seas are vast, but the skies are even more so. Why be content with one kingdom when I can rule them both?"
name: Talrand, Sky Summoner
text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 2/2 blue Drake creature token with flying.

flavor:
"Murder clad in crimson beauty,
An end to life and love and duty."
—Barrow witch incantation
name: Tempting Witch
text:
When Tempting Witch enters the battlefield, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice a Food: Target player loses 3 life.

name: Terramorphic Expanse
text: {T}, Sacrifice Terramorphic Expanse: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

name: Terrarion
text:
Terrarion enters the battlefield tapped.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Terrarion: Add two mana in any combination of colors.
When Terrarion is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

flavor: "To truly know something, you must become it. The trick is to not lose yourself in the process."
name: Thirst for Knowledge
text: Draw three cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard an artifact card.

flavor:
"Always carry two spears."
—Mokgar, Kalonian hunter
name: Thragtusk
text:
When Thragtusk enters the battlefield, you gain 5 life.
When Thragtusk leaves the battlefield, create a 3/3 green Beast creature token.

flavor: As eons passed, the rock wore away, revealing the rich colors at the mountain's heart.
name: Thriving Bluff
text:
Thriving Bluff enters the battlefield tapped.
As Thriving Bluff enters the battlefield, choose a color other than red.
{T}: Add {R} or one mana of the chosen color.

flavor: Far from human eyes, birds flit between vivid blossoms in a hidden paradise.
name: Thriving Grove
text:
Thriving Grove enters the battlefield tapped.
As Thriving Grove enters the battlefield, choose a color other than green.
{T}: Add {G} or one mana of the chosen color.

flavor: Wildflowers here bloom not with the season but with the ebb and flow of magic.
name: Thriving Heath
text:
Thriving Heath enters the battlefield tapped.
As Thriving Heath enters the battlefield, choose a color other than white.
{T}: Add {W} or one mana of the chosen color.

flavor: All the wonders of the natural world in one breathtaking microcosm.
name: Thriving Isle
text:
Thriving Isle enters the battlefield tapped.
As Thriving Isle enters the battlefield, choose a color other than blue.
{T}: Add {U} or one mana of the chosen color.

flavor: Beauty appears in strange places for those with eyes to see it.
name: Thriving Moor
text:
Thriving Moor enters the battlefield tapped.
As Thriving Moor enters the battlefield, choose a color other than black.
{T}: Add {B} or one mana of the chosen color.

flavor: "It appears that nature has risen against us." —Captain Brinely Rage
name: Thundering Spineback
text:
Other Dinosaurs you control get +1/+1.
{5}{G}: Create a 3/3 green Dinosaur creature token with trample.

flavor: Big distractions mean tiny nuisances can slip by unnoticed.
name: Tinybones, Trinket Thief
text:
At the beginning of each end step, if an opponent discarded a card this turn, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
{4}{B}{B}: Each opponent with no cards in hand loses 10 life.

flavor:
"I've always said full war chests win wars, but I didn't mean by bashing enemy skulls with them."
—Teysa
name: Tithebearer Giant
text: When Tithebearer Giant enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

flavor: "Knock, knock."
name: Towering Titan
text:
Towering Titan enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the total toughness of other creatures you control.
Sacrifice a creature with defender: All creatures gain trample until end of turn.

flavor: Wipe away the slobber and it's as good as new, give or take a few bite marks.
name: Trusty Retriever
text:
When Trusty Retriever enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Put a +1/+1 counter on Trusty Retriever.
• Return target artifact or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Ulvenwald Hydra
text:
Reach
Ulvenwald Hydra's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control.
When Ulvenwald Hydra enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

flavor: One day, they may be paragons of deadly elegance. For the moment, they possess nothing but thirst.
name: Vampire Neonate
text: {2}, {T}: Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

name: Vastwood Zendikon
text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land is a 6/4 green Elemental creature. It's still a land.
When enchanted land dies, return that card to its owner's hand.

flavor:
"The Knowledge Pool knows. Memnarch understands."
—Janus, speaker of the synod
name: Vedalken Archmage
text: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, draw a card.

name: Verdant Embrace
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has "At the beginning of each upkeep, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token."

flavor:
"How can we outrun the sky?"
—Hadran, sunseeder of Naya
name: Volcanic Fallout
text:
This spell can't be countered.
Volcanic Fallout deals 2 damage to each creature and each player.

flavor:
"Don't worry, sweet brother. Help is on the way."
—Ghoulcaller Gisa
name: Wailing Ghoul
text: When Wailing Ghoul enters the battlefield, put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.

flavor: Each flower identical, every leaf and petal disturbingly exact.
name: Wall of Blossoms
text:
Defender
When Wall of Blossoms enters the battlefield, draw a card.

flavor: Like all jungle plants, the vines must fight and claw for sunlight. Once their place is secured, they grow strong, sharp, and impenetrable.
name: Wall of Vines
text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

flavor: The best defense is a good offense.
name: Warmonger's Chariot
text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+2.
As long as equipped creature has defender, it can attack as though it didn't have defender.
Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

flavor: Even the lost and undead need a protector.
name: Wight of Precinct Six
text: Wight of Precinct Six gets +1/+1 for each creature card in your opponents' graveyards.

flavor:
"Life as we know it dangles on the brink of extinction. We must show the strength they would steal from us."
—*The Invokers' Tales*
name: Wildheart Invoker
text: {8}: Target creature gets +5/+5 and gains trample until end of turn.

flavor: Magic written across the sky falls like rain on thirsty ground, bringing forth wisdom in its season.
name: Winged Words
text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control a creature with flying.
Draw two cards.

flavor: Many hands for many evils.
name: Witch of the Moors
text:
Deathtouch
At the beginning of your end step, if you gained life this turn, each opponent sacrifices a creature and you return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

flavor: "The second mage learned to dissipate blasts of lightning. Threat and response: thus did the study of magic progress." —Naban, dean of iteration
name: Wizard's Retort
text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control a Wizard.
Counter target spell.

flavor: It carries the hopes of Zendikar's embattled wilds on its mighty boughs.
name: Woodborn Behemoth
text: As long as you control eight or more lands, Woodborn Behemoth gets +4/+4 and has trample. (It can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

name: Wren's Run Vanquisher
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal an Elf card from your hand or pay {3}.
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

flavor: Immolation is the sincerest form of flattery.
name: Young Pyromancer
text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 1/1 red Elemental creature token.

flavor:
"I was wrong. Zendikar isn't after me. It isn't after any of us. It's not evil or vengeful. It's magnificent . . . but it's in pain."
—Nissa Revane
name: Zendikar's Roil
text: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, create a 2/2 green Elemental creature token.

flavor: The nomads' funeral pyres are more practical than ceremonial.
name: Zombie Infestation
text: Discard two cards: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
